description: Real herbarium specimens collected in Saskatchewan, integrated into Barkour game world

specimens.notes: Provincial flower of Alberta, common across prairies
Important for wetland ecosystems, excellent for erosion control

game_placement.hint: Hidden near a wall - wall kick required

specimens.notes: Dominant boreal conifer, important timber species

game_placement.hint: On a narrow rooftop platform - precision required

specimens.notes: Rare orchid, sensitive to disturbance, slow to establish
Arctic-alpine species, found at high elevations in Cypress Hills

educational_notes.about: These specimens represent the diversity of Saskatchewan's ecosystems, from prairie grasslands to boreal forests to alpine tundra.
educational_notes.aafc_herbarium: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada maintains herbarium collections documenting Canadian plant biodiversity for research and conservation.
educational_notes.darwin_core: Specimen data follows Darwin Core standards for biodiversity informatics (scientificName, locality, catalogNumber, etc.)
educational_notes.learn_more: Visit GBIF.org to explore millions of biodiversity records worldwide
